ccache mpicxx -fPIC  -fmessage-length=0 -O3 -DNDEBUG -march=native -ftree-vectorize   -shared -Wl,-soname,librg.so -o librg.so CMakeFiles/rg.dir/exception/Exception.cc.o -L/home/chteflio/localW/lib /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_serialization.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_mpi.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_program_options.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_regex.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_filesystem.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_chrono.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/chteflio/localW/lib:
